## Parallel Unit Development (Git Worktree)
When starting a NEW unit while other units are in progress:
1. Check if current directory is already on a different unit branch
2. If so, create a worktree for the new unit:
   ```bash
   git worktree add ../gowoopi-{unit-name} -b feat/{unit-name} main
   ```
3. Inform user to open a new terminal in that directory
4. Each unit should be developed in its own worktree to enable parallel work

Worktree naming convention:
- gowoopi-unit3 → feat/unit3-customer-app
- gowoopi-unit4 → feat/unit4-admin-app

Use `task worktree:setup` for quick setup of all unit worktrees.

## Local Verification (MANDATORY)
After ANY code generation, you MUST run local checks before committing:

### Backend (Go)
```bash
cd backend && go test ./... && golangci-lint run
```

### Frontend (pnpm)
```bash
cd frontend && pnpm lint && pnpm test
```

Do NOT commit or push if any check fails. Fix issues first.
